scripts.build: esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/cli.cjs --external:pg-native --external:libpg-query && esbuild src/action/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/action/index.js --external:pg-native --external:libpg-query && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const src=fs.realpathSync('node_modules/libpg-query');const dst='dist/action/node_modules/libpg-query';fs.mkdirSync(p.dirname(dst),{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true})"
